tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to Automated Database Patching at Scale with Fleet Maintenance Workshop

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Environment Setup
tutorials.description: Setup compute instance running EM 13.3 with pre-configured database targets using Terraform script and Resource Manager

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Automated Database Patching at Scale with Fleet Maintenance
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the steps needed with Fleet Maintenance to automate patching of wide range of DB Configurations including Oracle RAC environments with Data Guard Standby

tutorials.title: Appendix: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
tutorials.description: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) you may refer to when troubleshooting issues encountered while executing above labs
